name: Ace in the H.O.L.E.
overview: The H.O.L.E. is the codename for the Human Orbital Legislation Enforcer. It is little more than a place of termination. The prison ship is now docking with the H.O.L.E. The medics are rolling up your sleeve and preparing a hypodermic. Ace Brannigan you are about to face the hazards of the H.O.L.E. Can you survive long enough to reach the shuttle-craft and freedom? OR Will you trigger one of the deadly devices that are set to bring about your demise?
